text: Mario Cruz Andrade (born 20 April 1957) is a Mexican politician from the Party of the Democratic Revolution. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Michoacán. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Michoacán Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Party of the Democratic Revolution politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Mario Cruz Andrade
